comment.author: 59362370@N05
comment._content: That large slab of rock does not look like Zambia. I suggest Zomba plateau Malawi?

comment.author: 59430401@N06
comment._content: This to me looks like the Great East Road (heading west) approaching Katete where it skirts the edge of the Mpangwe range near Mbangombe.

comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: This is  Zomba mt, Malawi, taken from the best viewpoint approaching from the south on the Blantyre-Zomba road, I have an almost identical photo.  The road is not in such good condition now.
